Package org.GameLogic.Clock

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Clockable
    The clockable object is implemented in Game.
    ClockInterface
    ClockInterface has to be implemented by Clock classes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Clock
    Base clock class.
    ClockTask
    ClockTask runs as a thread.
    GameClock
    GameClock implements two countdowns, turnTime and visualizationTime.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ClockState
    The state of clock.
    GameTickingState
    The state of gameclock.
